QuestData.Title: Vengeance for the Fallen
QuestData.Description: I... almost made it out. Most of us... dead. The others... they are no longer themselves.$b$bThese lurching spore beasts are the cause, dragging us further into the marsh... stop them.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for avenging my fallen friends. We will get to the bottom of this I swear!
